name: medieval-commanders-collection
description: A card collection website for medieval commanders

scripts.db:generate: npm run prisma:sync && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push: npm run prisma:sync && npx prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:deploy: npm run prisma:sync && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
